column5: Hey there guys and gals this is the first time I'm posting and  I just wanted to say that this site is great, a lot of you guys/gals have great info. So here's a question for ya. I'm look for 1/64 jig heads. I've ben to BPS,Lebaron,Crappy tire, and Walt mart, nobody seems to have them. Any info would be great.
hey hey.. welcome to the site.. you're sure they don't have them?? well. when in doubt. check ebay!.. see if you can find them there. cheers
Welcome to the site....Good luck with the search.
1/64 oz jigs are extremely hard to come by.  even the 1/32 oz ones.  eBay.com is the best resource.

Direct link to search results on eBay:  1/64 oz:  http://search.ebay.com/ws/search/SaleSearc...l=3&frpp=50   1/32 oz:  http://search.ebay.com/search/search.dll?s...ntrypage=search   1/16 oz:  http://search.ebay.com/search/search.dll?s...earch&fgtp=
Or .... maybe give these guys a call:  A V Fishing Tackle 4830 Sheppard Ave E Scarborough , ON M1S 5M9 (416) 293 8228  MAP:  http://411.ca/webdisplayservlet?cname=av+f...=1&id=21406
Look in to the areas of flyfishing lures they have lures called beadheads that are about that weight.  Art
Thanks for the great info will be checking out hte cabela's web site and e-bay
